name: Code Front End Dashboard Learning Management Agent
shortDescription: Generates a standalone HTML dashboard for course and student management.
fullDescription: This agent creates a single responsive HTML file for a Learning Management Dashboard, displaying course progress, student engagement, video metrics, evaluations, and certification issuance. It is built without external libraries and styled to match an existing landing page.
UseCases:
• Building lightweight educational dashboards
• Visualizing student progress and course completion
• Monitoring engagement with videos and lessons
• Managing evaluations and certification issuance
• Integrating a frontend with backend APIs for LMS systems
